page.title: 12St. Hedda's Church & School
page.content:
**{St. Hedda's Church & V.A. School}** {Egton Bridge
A{Roman Catholic Chapel}was built at {Egton Bridge}in 1790 and this original building is now used for{St. Hedda's {Roman Catholic Voluntary Aided Primary {School.}At present there are 45 children on role & 2 full time teachers.
In 1865 the present church was built - {Egton Bridge}has strong connections with the{Venerable Nicholas Postgate (See Clergy).
Every{July}a large Rally in honour of Father Postgate is held in a field at {Egton Bridge}- in 1985 two thousand people attended.
